2.text: Lure the dog into a lying down position.
2.vid: /3/3e/Teach a Dog to Lie Down Step 4 Version 2.360p.mp4

3.text: Put your hand gently on his shoulder.
3.vid: /4/4d/Teach a Dog to Lie Down Step 5 Version 2.360p.mp4

4.text: Try this trick if he’s reluctant.
4.vid: /c/c3/Teach a Dog to Lie Down Step 6 Version 2.360p.mp4

5.vid: /f/fa/Teach a Dog to Lie Down Step 7 Version 2.360p.mp4

6.text: Praise the dog and let him eat the treat immediately when he lies down.
6.vid: /8/8d/Teach a Dog to Lie Down Step 8 Version 2.360p.mp4

7.vid: /b/bd/Teach a Dog to Lie Down Step 3 Version 2.360p.mp4

8.vid: /a/af/Teach a Dog to Lie Down Step 9 Version 2.360p.mp4

9.vid: /4/49/Teach a Dog to Lie Down Step 10 Version 2.360p.mp4

10.text: Practice the steps above twice per day.
10.vid: /9/9d/Teach a Dog to Lie Down Step 11 Version 2.360p.mp4

11.text: Start using an empty hand but still giving a treat.
11.vid: /b/b6/Teach a Dog to Lie Down Step 12 Version 2.360p.mp4

12.vid: /c/c6/Teach a Dog to Lie Down Step 13 Version 2.360p.mp4

13.vid: /0/05/Teach a Dog to Lie Down Step 14 Version 2.360p.mp4

14.vid: /3/33/Teach a Dog to Lie Down Step 15 Version 2.360p.mp4

16.vid: /c/cd/Teach a Dog to Lie Down Step 17 Version 2.360p.mp4

17.text: Keep training sessions short and sweet.
17.vid: /c/c4/Teach a Dog to Lie Down Step 18 Version 2.360p.mp4

18.vid: /6/63/Teach a Dog to Lie Down Step 19 Version 2.360p.mp4

19.text: Work on one part of a new skill at a time.
19.vid: /8/8d/Teach a Dog to Lie Down Step 20 Version 2.360p.mp4

20.vid: /2/25/Teach a Dog to Lie Down Step 21 Version 2.360p.mp4

21.vid: /2/28/Teach a Dog to Lie Down Step 22 Version 2.360p.mp4
